menu.name: IMSpector
menu.tooltiptext: Set IMSpector settings such as protocols to listen on.

field.description: You can use the CTRL or COMMAND key to select multiple interfaces.
You can use the CTRL or COMMAND key to select multiple protocols.
Make sure to specify your MySQL credentials below.
Replace characters of matched bad word with *.

Place one word or phrase to match per line.
If left blank the default list in /usr/local/etc/imspector/badwords.txt will be used.
Block file transfers on supported protocols.
Overide the default of allowing user's not defined the whitelist or blacklist ACLs.

Example (allow specifc access): localuser: remoteuser1 remoteuser2
Example (allow full access): localuser:

Example (block specifc access): localuser: remoteuser1 remoteuser2
Example (block all access): localuser:
